post:
##QuadHost Ltd. April 2018 KVM VPS Offer

**256mb KVM Special**

    Single Intel vCore,
    256MB RAM,
    30GB RAID Storage,
    500GB Premium Bandwidth,
    1 IPv4 Address & /64 IPv6,
    Virtualizor control panel with VNC, Custom ISO's, rDNS management enabled.
    Available in North Carolina, US, London, UK or Varna, Bulgaria.
    Unmanaged

[Order for £15/year](https://quadhost.net/account/cart.php?a=add&pid=215&utm_source=LowEndTalk&utm_medium=offer-post&utm_term=order-now-k256&utm_campaign=LET-APR18)!

###Package Addons

-Additional IPv4 addresses are available for £1.25 per month charged annually due to package.

-Additional bandwidth pricing available on request - (price varying depending on volume and location).

-Upgrade of product to standard packages/range also available.


##25% Discount Code
You can get **25% off** all our Web Hosting and VPS Services until May with voucher code **"25APR18"** . Alternatively [open a sales enquiry](https://quadhost.net/account/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=4&utm_source=LowEndTalk&utm_medium=offer-post&utm_term=open-sales-enquiry&utm_campaign=LET-APR18) and we will do our best to make a custom plan to your requirements.


#####Additional Information

We accept PayPal, Stripe and BTC via Coinify. All billing is in GBP. No vouchers are needed to obtain this pricing. All pricing is VAT exclusive, where applicable VAT will be added at the final stage of checkout.  QuadHost Ltd. a limited company is registered in London, England, UK. Registration #09661301. Exchange rate taken as of 12:53 BST, 23/04/18 from Google - 1 USD = 0.81 GBP (15GBP = 20.92USD).
